title: Brian Rolapp, NFL Media Czar
description:
In an episode that originally aired on Recode Decode, the NFL's media czar Brian Rolapp talks with Peter Kafka about why a soon-to-be-auctioned set of games might (or might not) go to the Internet. Plus: What separates live sports from the rest of the TV business?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
